p: Note that these results are based on a relatively small sample size (Table 3 within S1 Text). However, others have also estimated a fitness advantage for the 90M mutation based on an independent data set [ 39]. Furthermore, it has been shown previously that 90M prevalence increased in the Swiss HIV cohort in recent years, although itâ€™s occurrence in patients failing treatment is declining [ 6]. These studies thus support that the 90M mutation has either a fitness advantage or at least no significant fitness cost.
